title: Type and Lettering Styles
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Type & Lettering Styles**

See also [Typeface Classification Schemes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typeface%20Classification%20Schemes).

[Blackletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blackletter) (includes [Textura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Textura), [Schwabacher](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Schwabacher), [Bastarda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bastarda), [Rundgotisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rundgotisch), [Gotisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotisch), [Civilite](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Civilite), and [Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fraktur))  
 [Calligraphy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Calligraphy)  
 [Carolingian Minuscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Carolingian%20Minuscule) (see also [Caroline](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Caroline))  
 [English Copperplate Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/English%20Copperplate%20Script)  
 [Garalde](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Garalde)  
 [Graffiti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Graffiti)  
 [Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Handwriting)  
 [Inscriptional](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Inscriptional)  
 [Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Modern)  
 [Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sans%20Serif) (includes [Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grotesk) [Humanist](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Humanist) [Geometric](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Geometric))  
 [Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Script)  
 [SemiSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SemiSerif)  
 [Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Serif)  
 [SlabSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SlabSerif)  
 [Stitching](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stitching)  
 [Transitional](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Transitional)  
 [Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Uncial)  
 [Venetian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193307/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Venetian)
author: Eric_West
